amendment.description: To honor and commend the contributions of all labor organizations within the United states.

vote.text: Amendment SA 531 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 531 proposed by Senator Sununu for Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S5394; text: CR S5394) To honor and commend the contributions of all labor organizations within the United states.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 531 proposed by Senator Sununu for Senator Hatch.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 531 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
